thread.title: RICKEY GILE
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by RICKEY GILE

author: RICKEY GILE
title: RICKEY GILE
text: Your store in Kansas City Kansas needs a better selection of computer accessories. It is anorexic at best. You advertise how you carry all these wonderful electronics, so start carrying them as well as accessories for computers like memory, video cards, etc.
